desc: Send a personalised message in a candle. The perfect gift for her, for mum, for a friend for anyone really! Say the words thank you, farewell, get well, congratulations, cheer up, I care about you or I love you in the most unique and meaningful way. Ready in 1-2 days. Made in Australia and waiting to make you smile.

layout.text:
Our scented, soy-wax candles reveal a message as they burn!
Create a candle that keeps the suspense alive and we'll have it ready in 1-2 days!
